summary: "TAKATA RECALL" WHILE DRIVING AT NIGHT ON A COUNTY ROAD AND SWITCHING FROM LOW BEAMS TO HIGH BEAMS, THE HEADLIGHTS WENT COMPLETELY DARK AND DID NOT COME BACK ON UNTIL SWITCHING BACK TO LOW BEAMS.  AFTER INSPECTION, NOTICED THE DAY RUNNERS ALSO WERE NOT WORKING.  ALL FUSES WERE PLUGGED IN AND GOOD.  REPLACING THE RELAY DID NOT FIX THE PROBLEM DESCRIBED HEREIN.
